About

Why I created this website

This blog was created as a compilation of notes that I'm making while coding. Sometimes I realized that I was repeating the same process of scouring the internet for pieces of a puzzle and doing the same mistakes. Here i hope to help myself in the future when I forget something while also helping others too.

Who Am I?

Fullstack web developer with experience in Javascript/Typescript, Python and C#. My first job as a programmer was back at 2019 at an already well consolidated educational platform startup. During covid isolation I started working remotely for a large company in Prague, Czech Republic.

Nowadays I'm working in a game that I plan to release on both PC and Smartphones. The game runs with Unity Engine and is written in C#.

I also have a bachelor in Architecture and Urban Planning and a Pos-graduation as a Software Architec. I guess you can tell by this that I love working with projects overall.

During my bachelor I studied for 1 year in Groningen, Netherlands at the University of Groningen, which helped me to improve my English and gave me the opportunity to visit a few places in Europe.

Now I'm living back home in Brazil in a small apartment with my loved cat called Lily.
